授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the intermediate level.
到達目標: Building upon the previous semester, students will engage in more challenging speaking tasks based on the topics listed in the syllabus. More emphasis is placed on the exchange of useful information and opinions.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover six conversation topics, including related vocabulary and structure activities.
授業方法: 対面授業の同時双方向でのオンライン配信(Zoomでの配信)Online format: On-demand A type using Zoom (posted on announcements). If you on campus, please meet in the classroom. Each semester will cover 6 units, with each unit taking two classes. Exercises are completed on LUNA and Publisher website. 2 Review tests online will evaluate students acquisition of the topic contents, vocabulary, structure, and conversation ability.
